name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 伴读AI助手：更舒适的侧边栏AI助手
name.en: Coreader:A More Comfortable Sidebar AI Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 一个全面优化的AI侧边栏助手：实时分析、智能问答、个性化设置，支持自主添加主流大模型，让您的浏览体验更智能、更高效。
short.en: A comprehensively optimized AI sidebar assistant: real-time analysis, intelligent Q&A, personalized settings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
伴读AI助手：更舒适的侧边栏AI助手
——功能全面，全新体验
• 智能分析：自动总结网页要点，拓展相关知识，解答您的疑问
• 实时互动：动态获取网页内容，随时为您提供相关见解，免去刷新烦恼
• 个性化体验： 更自然的对话模式，支持主题切换
• 广泛兼容： 支持自主无缝对接主流大型语言模型API，提供最先进的AI能力
long.en:
Reading companion AI assistant: a more comfortable sidebar AI assistant
——Comprehensive functions, new experience
• Intelligent analysis: automatically summarize the key points of web pages, expand relevant knowledge, and answer your questions
• Real-time interaction: Dynamically obtain web content and provide you with relevant insights at any time, eliminating the need to refresh
• Personalized experience: more natural conversation mode, supports theme switching
• Broad compatibility: supports independent and seamless connection with mainstream large-scale language model APIs, providing the most advanced AI capabilities
